mapper.insert:
insert into report_tbl (analysis_no,property_no, address, total_score, jeonse_rate, accord_owner, maximum_of_bond, use_type, violation_structure, common_owner, change_owner_count, owner_state) values (#{analysisNo},#{propertyNo}, #{address}, #{totalScore}, #{jeonseRate}, #{accordOwner}, #{maximumOfBond}, #{useType}, #{violationStructure}, #{commonOwner}, #{changeOwnerCount}, #{ownerState})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
